title: FS: WW Dick Pirates Accordion Postcard - Sold
author: timn1

posts.post_title: FS: WW Dick Pirates Accordion Postcard - Sold
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

 The whole fold-out postcard is quite rare and goes for a thousand or more - here you can pick up some pieces of it fairly cheaply.  SGC will grade the individual pieces as authentic as you see.

Backs are blank and free from writing, etc.  Wilson's back has part of the postcard design (stamp area, etc.)


SGC AU   $60 each
Abstein 
Adams 
Camnitz

RAW
Maddox/Leach (player on each side) - $60
Abbaticchio $45
Liefield $45
Wilson (rough edge) $40  

I'll make a good deal if you want the whole group!
